description:
This Upward Mobility CompTIA Security+ Flashcards app for Palm webOS provides 235 essential terms for the CompTIA Security+ certification exam.  Hone your knowledge of security terms concepts with this easy-to-use flash card app.   *   Each flash card contains a key  term or concept taken straight from the CompTIA Security+ exam, followed by a clear and concise explanation and definition.   *  Vocabulary topics include:
Confidentiality, Integrity, Availability (CIA) Concepts, Access Authentication, Security Attack, Topologies and Intrusion Detection, Cryptography and Encryption, Operational Security, Communication Security.  ||  Our flash card app has simple, intuitive navigation, with the ability to shuffle cards, to remove flash cards from the deck, and to reset the deck.  ||  This app is the ideal on-the-go study aid for the busy network security professional!  ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  We hire only expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and put all of our materials through a thorough review process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
